hero.tagline: Transforming data into insights | Building intelligent solutions

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Currently studying for a Master's in Mobiquity, Big Data and Systems at ESATIC (in partnership with CÃ´te d'Azur University), I wish to put to good use the skills I developed during my computer science degree and consolidated during a six-month internship in data analysis.
about.description2: With this first experience in data manipulation, statistical analysis and visualization, I am determined to take on new challenges and contribute to the success of an innovative data team.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis & Visualization
dataAnalysis.description: Transform raw data into actionable insights with advanced statistical analysis and compelling visualizations using Python, R, and modern BI tools.

ml.title: Machine Learning Solutions
ml.description: Develop and deploy intelligent ML models for prediction, classification, and pattern recognition to solve complex business problems.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Build modern, responsive web applications using React, TypeScript, and cutting-edge frameworks with focus on performance and user experience.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Create beautiful, cross-platform mobile applications with Flutter, delivering native performance and seamless user experiences.

db.title: Database Management
db.description: Design and optimize database architectures using SQL and NoSQL solutions, ensuring data integrity, security, and scalability.

bi.title: Business Intelligence
bi.description: Implement comprehensive BI solutions with interactive dashboards and automated reporting for data-driven decision making.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together!
contact.description: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!

footer.description: Data Scientist & Full Stack Developer passionate about transforming data into actionable insights.
